about_the_game:
Welcome to our game world!
It truly stands out from other games in its genre, and we are proud to have created it as it is.
This game may evoke different feelings: it may contradict your expectations or, conversely, fulfill your wildest desires.
But let it be your choice.
We just want to share our creativity with you and give you the opportunity to immerse yourself in our unique universe.
So, if you are ready for this challenge, let's dive in together!
And don't forget that in this game, there are no maps or health panels. This was intentionally done so that everyone can feel a part of the game, or choose to opt out while retaining their freedom of choice.

We are a team from Ukraine consisting of two talented developers who have dedicated over 3 years of their lives to creating a game called THE MOON HELL.
Our efforts and boundless motivation have brought us wonderful results, which we are excited to share with you.
Despite the difficulties and challenging circumstances, we were able to make this game unique and special.
(Unfortunately, the main part had to be developed during the war.)

ABOUT GAME

In this DARK fantasy action RPG, you can immerse yourself in a harsh world where every step can be your last. You will encounter an incredibly detailed world with a chilling atmosphere, where every corner is filled with fear and horror. Embark on a dangerous adventure and solve puzzles to reach your ultimate goal.

Gather strength, courage, and skill to survive a vast number of combat challenges. Protect your world from darkness and become a true hero. In this DARK fantasy action RPG, you can feel like a true warrior ready to fight anything that stands in your way.

FEATURES OF THE PROJECT

Get ready for 8 hours of thrilling gameplay full of incredible adventures and danger!
Players can enjoy a unique atmosphere in 6 different locations, each with its own distinctive features.

The non-target combat system allows players to test their skills depending on the chosen weapon.
The variety of AI is impressive - each one has their own unique habits and combat style, adding realism to the game. Are you ready for battle?
The variety of weapons, shields, and armor allows players to choose what suits them best.

And that's not all! THE MOON HELL has many secret places that will help uncover puzzles and secrets of the universe.

Each corner of the location is unique and requires exploration.

!GamePad is not supported!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content, there are scenes of fights, blood, monsters covered in lava

legal_notice: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content, there are scenes of fights, blood, monsters covered in lava
name: The Moon Hell

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD FX-6000 series | Intel i3 Skylake
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 280 | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (Windows 10) | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Windows 7)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 19 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 | Intel i5 Skylake
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 570 | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (Windows 10) | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 19 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Welcome to a world of darkness, where every step can be your last. Explore a stunning world filled with fear and horror, solve puzzles, and endure combat trials to become a hero and protect your world from darkness. Become a warrior ready to fight anything that stands in your way in this action RPG.
